sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Card class="border">
    <template #title> Weekly Calorie Intake </template>
    <template #content>
        <Chart type="bar" :data="basicData" :options="basicOptions" />
    </template>
  </Card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            basicData: {
                labels: ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'],
                datasets: [
                    {
                        label: 'My First dataset',
                        backgroundColor: '#42A5F5',
                        data: [2100, 2300, 2000, 1900, 2400, 1800, 2500]
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
.border {
  border-top: 8px solid var(--gray);
  height: 250px;
  margin: 10px;
  height: min-content;
}

</style>
